alert.note: Alert for Duval; Jim Wells; La Salle; Live Oak; McMullen; Webb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued April 12 at 3:43AM CDT until April 13 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...Critical Fire Weather Conditions possible Wednesday Afternoon... .Moderate to strong winds northwest to north winds between 18 to 22 with gusts from 25 to 30 mph will occur behind a front Wednesday over the Brush Country. Critically low relative humidity values and extremely dry fuels will result in critical fire weather conditions for areas along and west of Jim Wells and Live Oak counties on Wednesday afternoon. ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING FOR STRONG WINDS AND VERY LOW HUMIDITY FOR THE BRUSH COUNTRY... * AFFECTED AREA...La Salle...McMullen...Live Oak...Webb... Duval...Jim Wells Counties. * TIMING...From Noon to 7 PM CDT Wednesday * WIND...Northwest winds from 18 to 22 mph with gusts from 25 to 30 mph. * HUMIDITY...From 9 percent Webb/La Salle Counties to 19 percent Live Oak and Jim Wells Counties. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Duval; Jim Wells; La Salle; Live Oak; McMullen; Webb
